body:
Hi all,



Chris, Mostapha, team, thank you for the great work so far! I would be keen on trying any beta release of the integration of HB to EPC. I think it will add a great value to the plug-in and will bring its functionality to a whole new level! Any indication on when this might be due to release? Also a similar integration of a Passive House standard calculations sheet would be very handy! I am attaching a PHPP Demo calculation sheet that is provided for free from the PassiveHouse institute in Germany ([www.passiv.de](http://www.passiv.de)). Is only for indicative purposes, just to get an idea! 



Looking forward! 



Tasos
